title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama CLI and server for running large language models locally with a simple API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama, providing synchronous and asynchronous APIs.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, works in Node and browsers via fetch.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that wraps Ollama models for use in LangChain chains and agents.

title: llama-index-integrations-llms-ollama
summary: LlamaIndex LLM integration for Ollama, enabling RAG pipelines with local models.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (now renamed open-webui) with chat, model management, and RAG.

title: open-webui
summary: Successor to ollama-webui, an open-source ChatGPT-style interface for Ollama and more.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Cross-platform TUI (terminal UI) for chatting with Ollama models written in Rust.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Experimental GitHub Copilot-like plugin that uses Ollama models for code completions.

title: ollama-chat
summary: Minimal React chat app that connects to a local Ollama instance via the JS client.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images (CPU and GPU) for running Ollama server in containers.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration that adds OllamaGenerator and OllamaChatGenerator components.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C#/.NET client for Ollama with async streaming support.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client library for Ollama, generated from the OpenAPI spec.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem for interacting with Ollama, supports streaming and embeddings.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java client for Ollama with builder-style API, streaming, and embedding support.
